item.text: Now a certain man, a Pharisee named Nicodemus, who was a member of the Jewish ruling council,

<st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> at <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4461" class="">Rabbi</st>, we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st> you are a <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st> who has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st> the <st data-num="4592" class="">miraculous signs</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">person</st> is <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="509">from above</st>,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>.”<n id="4" />
Nicodemus said to him, “How can a man be born when he is old? He cannot enter his mother’s womb and be born a second time, can he?”
Jesus answered, “I tell you the solemn truth, unless a person is born of water and spirit, he cannot enter the kingdom of God.

What is <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> what is <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘You <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> all<n id="1" /> be <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="509" class="">from above</st>.’<n id="2" />
The wind blows wherever it will, and you hear the sound it makes, but do not know where it comes from and where it is going. So it is with everyone who is born of the Spirit.”
Nicodemus replied, “How can these things be?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1510">Are</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> the <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet you <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>?<n id="2" />

I <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> about <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> about <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we have <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> you people<n id="3" /> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I have <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> people<n id="1" /> about <st data-num="1919">earthly things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will you <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> about <st data-num="2032">heavenly things</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3762" class="">No one</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="305" class="">ascended</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> the one who <st data-num="2597" class="">descended</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>—the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st>.<n id="3" />
Just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, so must the Son of Man be lifted up,
so that everyone who believes in him may have eternal life.”
For this is the way God loved the world: He gave his one and only Son, so that everyone who believes in him will not perish but have eternal life.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> his <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">condemn</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> should be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

The one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> is <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">condemned</st>.<n id="1" /> The one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> has been <st data-num="2919" class="">condemned</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he has <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="3439">one and only</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2920" class="">basis for judging</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> has <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> the <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="4238">does</st> <st data-num="5337">evil deeds</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hates</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1651" class="">exposed</st>.
But the one who practices the truth comes to the light, so that it may be plainly evident that his deeds have been done in God.
After this, Jesus and his disciples came into Judean territory, and there he spent time with them and was baptizing.

<st data-num="2491" class="">John</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptizing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="137" class="">Aenon</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st> <st data-num="4530" class="">Salim</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">plentiful</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> people were <st data-num="3854" class="">coming</st><n id="3" /> to him<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> being <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>.
(For John had not yet been thrown into prison.)
Now a dispute came about between some of John’s disciples and a certain Jew concerning ceremonial washing.
So they came to John and said to him, “Rabbi, the one who was with you on the other side of the Jordan River, about whom you testified—see, he is baptizing, and everyone is flocking to him!”
John replied, “No one can receive anything unless it has been given to him from heaven.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="846" class="">yourselves</st> can <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="3004">said</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">‘I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ,’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="235">but rather</st>, ‘I <st data-num="1510">have been</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">him.’</st>

The one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3565" class="">bride</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st>. The <st data-num="5384" class="">friend</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st>, who <st data-num="2476">stands by</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listens</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoices</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">greatly</st><n id="1" /> when he hears <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3566">bridegroom’s</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>. <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> is <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>, and it is <st data-num="4137" class="">complete</st>.<n id="2" />
He must become more important while I become less important.”
The one who comes from above is superior to all. The one who is from the earth belongs to the earth and speaks about earthly things. The one who comes from heaven is superior to all.

He <st data-num="3140" class="">testifies</st> about <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he has <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">accepts</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st>.

The one who has <st data-num="2983" class="">accepted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> has <st data-num="4972">confirmed clearly</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">truthful</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> the <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="1537 3358">sparingly</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">under</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">authority</st>.<n id="1" />
The one who believes in the Son has eternal life. The one who rejects the Son will not see life, but God’s wrath remains on him.
